1.0.1.name: wordpress/kuerzes-twitterconnector
1.0.1.description:
This plugin works as an configurable url shortener and twitter connector. Your post title will get posted to twitter with a custom prefix and custom suffix. The URLs used in the tweets are shortened through http://kuerz.es/ URL shortener.

Attention: The plugin require PHP 5.2 or higher and PHP-Curl installed to work!
